00095 class LAManager {
00096 
00097         LAConfiguration config; 
00098 
00099 
00100         Analyzer* enNounFilter;
00101         Analyzer* krNounFilter;
00102         Analyzer* lenFilter;
00103         Analyzer* stopFilter;
00104         Analyzer* stemAnalyzer;
00105         Analyzer* ngramAnalyzer;
00106 
00107 public:
00108 
00109         LAManager(const LAConfiguration& conf):config(conf)
00110         ,enNounFilter(0)
00111         ,krNounFilter(0)
00112         ,lenFilter(0)
00113         ,stopFilter(0)
00114         ,stemAnalyzer(0)
00115         ,ngramAnalyzer(0)
00116         {
00117                 setConfig(config);
00118         }
00119 
00121         LAManager(){}
00122 
00123         ~LAManager(){
00124                 if(enNounFilter != 0)
00125                         delete enNounFilter;
00126                 if(krNounFilter != 0)
00127                         delete krNounFilter;
00128                 if(lenFilter != 0)
00129                         delete lenFilter;
00130                 if(stopFilter != 0)
00131                         delete stopFilter;
00132                 if(stemAnalyzer != 0)
00133                         delete stemAnalyzer;
00134                 if(ngramAnalyzer != 0)
00135                         delete ngramAnalyzer;
00136         }
00137 
00138         void setConfig(const LAConfiguration& conf){
00139                 config = conf;
00140 
00141                 if(config.useNounFilter){
00142                         if(config.language == LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_ENGLISH)
00143                                 enNounFilter = new EnglishNounFilter(config.posModelDirEN);
00144                         else if (config.language == LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_KOREAN)
00145                                 krNounFilter = new KoreanNounFilter(config.posModelDirKR);
00146                 }
00147 
00148                 if(config.useLengthFilter)
00149                         lenFilter = new LengthFilter(config.minChar, config.maxChar);
00150 
00151                 if(config.useStopFilter)
00152                         stopFilter = new StopFilter(config.stopDicPath, config.encodingType);
00153 
00154                 if(config.useStemAnalyzer)
00155                         if(config.language > LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_UNKNOWN && config.language < LAConfiguration::LANGUAGE_EOS)
00156                                 stemAnalyzer = new StemAnalyzer(config.language, config.encodingType);
00157 
00158                 if(config.useNGramAnalyzer)
00159                         ngramAnalyzer = new NGramAnalyzer(config.minGram, config.maxGram, config.charLevelNgram);
00160 
00161         }
00162 
00167         bool analyze(const UString& inputString, TermList& rawTerms, TermList& primaryTerms, TermList& secondaryTerms);
00168 
00171         bool analyze(const UString& inputString, TermList& secondaryTerms);
